learner.Title: A passionate learner
learner.Description: Always expecting to face new challenges and learn new things.

sports.Title: Sportsman
sports.Description: Nothing is better than practicing sports before the day starts.

social.Title: Social
social.Description: A friendly person who loves meeting new people. Never going to say no to an afterwork!

web.Title: Web
web.Description: I am an experienced web developer. I worked with different libraries and languages on professional and personal projects.

reactive.Title: Reactive web apps
reactive.Description: I masterized in ReactJS development (using Typescript + Vite) as I developed dozens of projects using it. Also I am used to work with Svelte and Vue.

commons.Title: Web commons
commons.Description: As an experienced web developer I excel when using the common web languages.
